alert.note: Alert for Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart; Marshall; Northern Kosciusko; Northern La Porte; Southern Kosciusko; Southern La Porte; Starke; Western St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 8:13AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Elkhart, southern St. Joseph, northern Kosciusko, northeastern Starke, Marshall and east central La Porte Counties through 900 AM EDT/800 AM CDT/... At 813 AM EDT/713 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lakeville to near Walkerton. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lakeville around 820 AM EDT. Plymouth and Bremen around 830 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Nappanee, Argos, Bourbon and Warsaw. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart; Marshall; Northern Kosciusko; Northern La Porte; Southern Kosciusko; Southern La Porte; Starke; Western St. Joseph
